mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.apple_id AS "appleId", a.apple_pwd AS "applePwd", a.is_use AS "isUse", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hc_apple( id, apple_id, apple_pwd, is_use, create_by, update_by, create_date, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{appleId}, #{applePwd}, #{isUse}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: update hc_apple_temp t, hc_apple a set t.is_repeat='1' where t.apple_id = a.apple_id
mapper.select: INSERT INTO hc_apple ( SELECT a.id , a.apple_id , a.apple_pwd , a.is_use , a.create_by , a.update_by , a.create_date , a.update_date , a.del_flag FROM hc_apple_temp a WHERE a.is_repeat='0' )
